parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. The time span between the start time and the end time cannot exceed 31 days. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number. Valid values: any non-zero positive integer.

Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **30** to **100**. Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: SortKey
parameters.description:
The dimension based on which the system sorts the entries to return. Valid values:

*   **TotalExecutionCounts**: The system sorts the entries to return based on the number of times that SQL statements are executed.
*   **TotalQueryTimes**: The system sorts the entries to return based on the total execution duration.
*   **TotalLogicalReads**: The system sorts the entries to return based on the total number of logical reads.
*   **TotalPhysicalReads**: The system sorts the entries to return based on the total number of physical reads.

> This parameter is supported only for instances that run SQL Server 2008 R2.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*Z format. The time must be in UTC.
